original_title: Off-Road Caravan Monsters- Motorhomes For Adventures
overview: These bodies make every camper's heart beat faster: Individually designed and extravagantly furnished long-distance motorhomes are the latest craze on the caravan market - at least for those amateur campers who can afford the unusual models. The off-road companions and rolling luxury suites have no upper price limits. Who are the owners of the most expensive caravans in Germany, and what about the hoods of their rolling homes?
title: Off-Road Caravan Monsters- Motorhomes For Adventures
